data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Saint David, Grenada.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint David, Grenada
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 2,428 believers in Saint David to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Saint David, Grenada.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Saint David to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, fill the 2,428 believers in the state of Saint David with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Saint David, Grenada to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saint David, Grenada to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Saint David against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint David, Grenada has a population of 12,900.

We estimate Saint David has 2,428 people who might know Jesus, 9,490 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 982 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.
